Conditional formatting is a great way to visualize your progress towards rewards.

And, absolutely, you can use this spreadsheet to track your email confirmations for loyalty program purchases! Here's how:

**Tracking Email Confirmations:**

1. Add a new sheet to your spreadsheet, e.g., "Email Confirmations"
2. Create columns for:
	* **Date**: Date of purchase or transaction
	* **Program**: Loyalty program name
	* **Transaction ID**: Unique ID or reference number for the transaction
	* **Points Earned**: Number of points earned from the transaction (if applicable)
	* **Confirmation Email**: A checkbox or a column to mark when you've received the confirmation email
3. Each time you make a purchase or earn points, add a new row to this sheet with the relevant details
4. Use filters or sorting to quickly view transactions by program, date, or status (e.g., pending confirmation)

This will help you keep track of your transactions and ensure you receive the points or rewards you've earned. You can also use this sheet to:

* Verify that you've received points for recent transactions
* Identify any missing points or rewards
* Keep a record of your transaction history for future reference

**Tips:**

* Consider adding a column for notes or comments to jot down any issues or follow-ups related to a transaction
* If you're using a specific email client or inbox, you can set up filters or labels to automatically categorize and organize your loyalty program emails
* You can also use this sheet to track other types of loyalty program communications, such as newsletters or promotional offers

By integrating email confirmation tracking into your spreadsheet, you'll have a more comprehensive view of your loyalty program activity and be better equipped to manage your points and rewards.
